description: Convolution of A007054 (super ballot numbers) with A000984 (central binomial coefficients).
links: Guo-Niu Han, Enumeration of Standard Puzzles [Cached copy]
formula: a(n) = (n+3)*C(n+1), C(n): Catalan numbers A000108, G.f.: c(x)*(4-c(x))/sqrt(1-4*x), c(x): G.f. for Catalan numbers.
author: _Wolfdieter Lang_
